document_data.name: Garlen
document_data.mainbody: '''Garlen''' was a young man from [[Bloodstone Village]] in [[Damara]] who helped liberate his home from the bandit army of [[Vaasa]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: At age 19, he was {{SI|5'9"|'"|long=yes}} tall, weighed {{SI|145|pound|k|long=yes}}, and had brown hair and eyes.
document_data.Personality: Garlen and his cousin Garvin were both very excitable and prone to hero worship. They often finished each other's sentences.
document_data.Relationships: Garlen was close with his cousin, [[Garvin]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, Garlen and his cousin Garvin left Bloodstone Village and traveled to the town of [[Valls]] to find heroes who could deliver their hometown from Vaasa's oppression. While attending the [[Circus of Doctor Trundles]], the boys witnessed [[Gareth Dragonsbane]] and his adventuring companions put down an outbreak of rampaging monsters. impressed by their skill and bravery, the boys asked the heroes for their aid, and then guided them through the [[Galena Mountains]] to Bloodstone. Once there, Garlen and Garvin arranged a meeting between the adventurers and the town's leader, [[Tranth|Baron Tranth]].
